meanings.definition: A machine that converts mechanical energy into electrical energy
meanings.sent1: The turbogenerators at the power plant are essential for producing electricity.
meanings.sent2: The company invested in new turbogenerators to increase energy production.
meanings.sent3: The turbogenerators decided to take a break after working tirelessly all day.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like turbogenerators, constantly converting thoughts into creative energy.
meanings.sent5: The hum of the turbogenerators filled the room, a constant reminder of power generation.

meanings.definition: A device that uses a turbine to generate electricity
meanings.sent1: The turbogenerators in the hydroelectric plant are powered by water.
meanings.sent2: During the storm, the turbogenerators kept the lights on in the city.
meanings.sent3: The turbogenerators were in a race to see who could generate the most electricity.
meanings.sent4: His ideas flowed through his mind like a whirlwind in the turbogenerators.
meanings.sent5: The futuristic spaceship was powered by advanced turbogenerators, propelling it through space.
